description: ACL abuse and privilege escalation path queries. Uses GenericAll, WriteDacl, WriteOwner, ForceChangePassword, GetChanges, and other ACL-based edges to find paths to Domain Admin.

queries.name: DCSync Rights
queries.description: Find principals with DCSync rights (GetChanges + GetChangesAll on Domain). Can perform secretsdump.py to extract all domain hashes.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (n)-[r:GetChanges|GetChangesAll]->(d:Domain)
RETURN DISTINCT n.name AS Principal,
       labels(n) AS Type,
       type(r) AS Right
queries.expected_results: Principals with DCSync rights for domain hash extraction

queries.name: GenericAll on High-Value Targets
queries.description: Find principals with GenericAll (full control) over privileged users, groups, or computers. Can reset passwords, modify group memberships, etc.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[:GenericAll]->(victim)
WHERE victim.admincount = true
   OR victim.name =~ '(?i).*(ADMIN|DOMAIN|ENTERPRISE).*'
RETURN attacker.name AS Attacker,
       victim.name AS Victim,
       labels(victim) AS VictimType
LIMIT 50
queries.expected_results: Attack paths via GenericAll to privileged objects

queries.name: Shadow Admins (Control over DA Users)
queries.description: Find non-privileged users with control over Domain Admin accounts. These 'shadow admins' can escalate without being in DA group.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[r:GenericAll|GenericWrite|ForceChangePassword|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|Owns]->(victim:User)
WHERE victim.admincount = true
  AND NOT attacker.admincount = true
RETURN attacker.name AS ShadowAdmin,
       type(r) AS Permission,
       victim.name AS CanControl
queries.expected_results: Non-privileged users who control privileged accounts

queries.name: WriteDacl Abuse Paths
queries.description: Find principals with WriteDacl on high-value targets. Can grant themselves GenericAll then escalate further.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[:WriteDacl]->(victim)
WHERE victim.admincount = true
   OR victim.name =~ '(?i).*(ADMIN|DOMAIN).*'
RETURN attacker.name AS Attacker,
       victim.name AS Victim,
       labels(victim) AS VictimType
queries.expected_results: Principals who can modify permissions on privileged objects

queries.name: WriteOwner Abuse Paths
queries.description: Find principals with WriteOwner on targets. Can take ownership, then WriteDacl, then GenericAll.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[:WriteOwner]->(victim)
WHERE victim.admincount = true
   OR victim.name =~ '(?i).*(ADMIN|DOMAIN).*'
RETURN attacker.name AS Attacker,
       victim.name AS Victim,
       labels(victim) AS VictimType
queries.expected_results: Principals who can take ownership of privileged objects

queries.name: AddKeyCredentialLink (Shadow Credentials)
queries.description: Find principals with AddKeyCredentialLink permission. Can add msDS-KeyCredentialLink for certificate-based auth without knowing password.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[:AddKeyCredentialLink]->(victim)
WHERE NOT attacker.admincount = true
RETURN attacker.name AS Attacker,
       labels(attacker) AS AttackerType,
       victim.name AS Target,
       labels(victim) AS TargetType
queries.expected_results: Principals who can perform shadow credentials attack

queries.name: ForceChangePassword Rights
queries.description: Find principals who can reset passwords without knowing current password. Direct credential compromise.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[:ForceChangePassword]->(victim:User)
WHERE NOT attacker.admincount = true
  AND victim.enabled = true
RETURN attacker.name AS Attacker,
       victim.name AS CanResetPassword,
       victim.admincount AS VictimIsPrivileged
ORDER BY victim.admincount DESC
queries.expected_results: Non-privileged users who can reset others' passwords

queries.name: AddMember to Privileged Groups
queries.description: Find principals who can add members to privileged groups. Direct path to privilege escalation.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[:AddMember]->(group:Group)
WHERE group.admincount = true
   OR group.name =~ '(?i).*(ADMIN|DOMAIN|ENTERPRISE).*'
RETURN attacker.name AS Attacker,
       group.name AS CanAddMembersTo
queries.expected_results: Principals who can add themselves to privileged groups

queries.name: Owns Relationships on Users/Groups
queries.description: Find principals who own other users or groups. Owner can grant themselves full control.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (owner)-[:Owns]->(owned)
WHERE owned.admincount = true
   OR owned.name =~ '(?i).*(ADMIN|DOMAIN).*'
RETURN owner.name AS Owner,
       owned.name AS OwnedObject,
       labels(owned) AS ObjectType
queries.expected_results: Owners of privileged objects who can take control

queries.name: GPO Abuse Paths
queries.description: Find users with write access to GPOs linked to computers. Can push malicious scripts via GPO.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[r:GenericAll|GenericWrite|WriteProperty]->(g:GPO)
WHERE NOT u.admincount = true
RETURN u.name AS User,
       g.name AS GPO,
       type(r) AS Permission
queries.expected_results: Non-privileged users with GPO modification rights

queries.name: OU Control for Object Manipulation
queries.description: Find principals with GenericAll on OUs containing privileged objects. Can modify objects within the OU.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[:GenericAll]->(ou:OU)
WHERE NOT attacker.admincount = true
RETURN attacker.name AS Attacker,
       ou.name AS ControlledOU
queries.expected_results: Non-privileged users with OU control

queries.name: AllExtendedRights Enumeration
queries.description: Find principals with AllExtendedRights on objects. Includes ForceChangePassword, Read LAPS, etc.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[:AllExtendedRights]->(target)
WHERE NOT attacker.admincount = true
  AND (target.admincount = true OR target.name =~ '(?i).*(ADMIN|DOMAIN).*')
RETURN attacker.name AS Attacker,
       target.name AS Target,
       labels(target) AS TargetType
queries.expected_results: Non-privileged users with extended rights on privileged objects

queries.name: Read LAPS Password Rights
queries.description: Find principals who can read LAPS passwords on computers. Direct local admin credential access.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (n)-[:ReadLAPSPassword]->(c:Computer)
WHERE NOT n.admincount = true
RETURN n.name AS Principal,
       labels(n) AS Type,
       c.name AS Computer,
       c.bloodtrail_ip AS ComputerIP
queries.expected_results: Non-privileged principals who can read LAPS passwords

queries.name: All Domain Admins
queries.description: List all members of Domain Admins group (including nested membership). Know your targets.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)
WHERE g.name =~ '(?i).*DOMAIN ADMINS.*'
RETURN DISTINCT u.name AS DomainAdmin,
       u.enabled AS Enabled,
       u.admincount AS AdminCount
queries.expected_results: All Domain Admin members for target identification

queries.name: GenericWrite on Users
queries.description: Find principals with GenericWrite on users. Can modify SPN for Kerberoasting or set logon script.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[:GenericWrite]->(victim:User)
WHERE victim.enabled = true
  AND NOT attacker.admincount = true
RETURN attacker.name AS Attacker,
       victim.name AS Victim,
       victim.admincount AS VictimIsPrivileged
ORDER BY victim.admincount DESC
LIMIT 50
queries.expected_results: Non-privileged users with GenericWrite on other users

queries.name: WriteSPN for Targeted Kerberoasting
queries.description: Find principals who can write SPNs on users. Allows setting an SPN on a privileged user for targeted Kerberoasting attack.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[:WriteSPN]->(victim:User)
WHERE NOT attacker.admincount = true
  AND victim.enabled = true
RETURN attacker.name AS Attacker,
       labels(attacker) AS AttackerType,
       victim.name AS Target,
       victim.admincount AS TargetIsPrivileged
ORDER BY victim.admincount DESC
queries.expected_results: Non-privileged principals who can set SPNs for targeted Kerberoasting

queries.name: WriteAccountRestrictions for RBCD
queries.description: Find principals who can modify msDS-AllowedToActOnBehalfOfOtherIdentity. Enables Resource-Based Constrained Delegation attacks.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[:WriteAccountRestrictions]->(c:Computer)
WHERE NOT attacker.admincount = true
RETURN attacker.name AS Attacker,
       labels(attacker) AS AttackerType,
       c.name AS RBCDTarget,
       c.bloodtrail_ip AS RBCDTargetIP
queries.expected_results: Non-privileged principals who can configure RBCD on computers

queries.name: SyncLAPSPassword Rights
queries.description: Find principals with SyncLAPSPassword rights. Can retrieve LAPS passwords via domain-wide synchronization.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (n)-[:SyncLAPSPassword]->(c:Computer)
WHERE NOT n.admincount = true
RETURN n.name AS Principal,
       labels(n) AS Type,
       collect(c.name) AS Computers,
       collect(c.bloodtrail_ip) AS ComputerIPs,
       count(c) AS ComputerCount
ORDER BY ComputerCount DESC
queries.expected_results: Non-privileged principals with LAPS sync access

queries.name: AddAllowedToAct Rights
queries.description: Find principals with AddAllowedToAct permission. Can directly configure RBCD without full GenericWrite.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (attacker)-[:AddAllowedToAct]->(c:Computer)
WHERE NOT attacker.admincount = true
RETURN attacker.name AS Attacker,
       labels(attacker) AS AttackerType,
       c.name AS RBCDTarget,
       c.bloodtrail_ip AS RBCDTargetIP
queries.expected_results: Principals with explicit AddAllowedToAct permission

queries.name: DCSync (Composite Check)
queries.description: Find principals with BOTH GetChanges AND GetChangesAll on the domain. These can perform DCSync to extract all password hashes.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (n)-[:GetChanges]->(d:Domain)
MATCH (n)-[:GetChangesAll]->(d)
WHERE NOT n.admincount = true
RETURN n.name AS DCSync_Principal,
       labels(n) AS Type,
       d.name AS Domain
queries.expected_results: Non-privileged principals with full DCSync rights

queries.name: Check Account Operators Membership
queries.description: Check if user is member of Account Operators group (directly or nested). Account Operators can create users and add to non-protected groups.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (u:User {name:'<USER>'})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)
WHERE g.name =~ '(?i)ACCOUNT OPERATORS@.*'
RETURN u.name AS User,
       g.name AS Group,
       'Can create users and modify non-protected groups' AS Capability
queries.expected_results: User's Account Operators membership if present

queries.name: Check Exchange WriteDACL on Domain
queries.description: Check if Exchange Windows Permissions group has WriteDACL on the domain. This is the prerequisite for the Exchange WriteDACL to DCSync attack chain.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (g:Group)-[:WriteDacl]->(d:Domain)
WHERE g.name =~ '(?i)EXCHANGE WINDOWS PERMISSIONS@.*'
RETURN g.name AS ExchangeGroup,
       d.name AS Domain,
       'Can grant DCSync rights via WriteDACL' AS AttackPotential
queries.expected_results: Exchange Windows Permissions group with WriteDACL on domain

queries.name: Check Backup Operators Membership
queries.description: Check if user is member of Backup Operators. Can backup SAM/SYSTEM hives for offline credential extraction.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (u:User {name:'<USER>'})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)
WHERE g.name =~ '(?i)BACKUP OPERATORS@.*'
RETURN u.name AS User,
       g.name AS Group,
       'Can backup SAM/SYSTEM hives' AS Capability
queries.expected_results: User's Backup Operators membership if present

queries.name: Check Server Operators Membership
queries.description: Check if user is member of Server Operators. Can log on to DCs, manage services, and potentially escalate.
queries.cypher:
MATCH (u:User {name:'<USER>'})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)
WHERE g.name =~ '(?i)SERVER OPERATORS@.*'
RETURN u.name AS User,
       g.name AS Group,
       'Can manage services on DCs' AS Capability
queries.expected_results: User's Server Operators membership if present

queries.name: Check AddMember to Specific Group
queries.description: Check if user can add members to a specific group (directly or via group membership).
queries.cypher:
MATCH (u:User {name:'<USER>'})-[:AddMember|MemberOf*1..5]->(target:Group {name:'<TARGET_GROUP>'})
RETURN u.name AS User,
       target.name AS TargetGroup,
       'Can add members to group' AS Capability

TARGET_GROUP.description: Target group to check AddMember permission

queries.expected_results: User's ability to add members to target group
